alert.note: Alert for Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 09 at 6:09AM MDT until July 09 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...High temperatures 96 to 102 degrees. Limited relief at night with low temperatures 63 to 71 degrees. * WHERE...Alpowa Summit, Clarkston, Chelan, Nespelem, Omak, Moses Lake, Wenatchee, Bridgeport, Peck, Pangborn Airport, Lapwai, Culdesac, Lewiston, Tonasket, Oroville, Brewster, Number 2 Canyon, Ephrata, Quincy, Entiat, Lewiston Grade, Okanogan, Gifford, Number 1 Canyon, Disautel Pass, Cashmere, Pomeroy, and Othello. * WHEN...Until 8 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat related illnesses. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...People acclimated to heat are also susceptible to heat related illness. Everyone should take precaution to avoid heat related illness.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.
